summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Charles Street, from its intersection at Seattle Boulevard to 8th Avenue South; 8th Avenue South, from Charles Street to Addition Street; thence crossing Seattle Boulevard from Addition Street to Atlantic Street; thence along 8th Avenue South, from Atlantic Street to an intersection with the existing roadway thereon 30 feet in width and wooden walks 6 feet in width along one side thereof, all in accordance with Resolution No. 445 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
